translation.Com a BSL Data Security, você terá todas: With BSL Data Security, you will have all the essential tools to build a secure and prosperous future for your company. Discover our solutions today and ensure the lasting success of your company.

translation.Nossa equipe de especialistas em engenha: Our team of data engineering experts is ready to offer an approach focused on quality, security and efficiency, we design and implement custom data pipelines, ensuring the integrity, availability and confidentiality of your data.
translation.Há mais de nove anos, a BSL Data Securit: For over nine years, BSL Data Security has been present in the market, offering reliable and innovative solutions for a wide range of business needs globally, with a diverse customer base in Brazil, the United States and the United Kingdom.
translation.Especializados no gerenciamento de banco: Specialized in database management of the most diverse technologies, including Oracle, Microsoft SQL, MySQL, Hana, among others, our experienced team is dedicated to offering the highest quality services, guaranteeing high performance without compromising the essential security for data. our clients. Furthermore, we highlight our expertise in working both in local environments and in the main public clouds.
translation.Com nossas principais certificações em O: With our main Oracle certifications, we are qualified to navigate environments with complex infrastructures, using the supplier's most recommended resources, such as Oracle RAC, Exadata, Dataguard, Tuning and Diagnostic Package. Furthermore, we offer exclusive monitoring using the most used tool on the market, Zabbix, providing customers with a detailed and real-time view of their critical operations.
translation.Reconhecemos a importância da capacitaçã: We recognize the importance of continuous team training and, therefore, we offer specialized training for teams of DBAs, keeping them up to date with the latest practices and technologies in the sector.
translation.Na BSL Data Security, estamos comprometi: At BSL Data Security, we are committed to providing reliable, customized solutions to meet our customers' unique needs, driving their business success through efficient and secure management of their critical data.

translation.Nossa equipe de Segurança de Dados está: Our Data Security team is here to ensure your important data is always protected. We take care of everything from identifying and classifying your data to monitoring who has access to it, all to keep your information safe. We use advanced analytics to identify potential vulnerabilities, providing you with the visibility you need through an intuitive and easy-to-use control panel. Our commitment is to ensure that your company complies with the most rigorous security standards, while automating processes and reducing costs. and we implement policies that ensure a safe and trustworthy environment for everyone.
translation.Benefícios da BSL Data Security para a S: BSL Data Security Benefits for Data Security
translation.Reconhecemos a singularidade inerente a: We recognize the uniqueness inherent to each corporate entity. Our approach is based on the meticulous adaptation of our solutions to ideally align with your company's specific infrastructure, without distinction as to organizational size.
translation.Em adição à proteção dos seus dados, nós: In addition to protecting your data, we strive to comprehensively improve your security. This commitment translates into a significant reduction in the inherent risks and costs associated with data security.

translation.Nosso objetivo não é apenas proteger os: Our goal is not just to protect data, but also to provide security and peace of mind for every customer who trusts us to protect what matters most, their most precious data with unmatched integrity, confidentiality and availability. Through continuous innovation with technology cutting edge and a customer-centric approach where we are committed to building a safe environment where trust prevails.
